Original: 「...おい! おい!」<CF><D1>...? だれかが ぼくの 名前を<CD>よんでる...ぼくの 名前...
Translated: ...Hey! Hey...!<CF><D1>...? <D3>Someone's calling my name...<CF>My name...

Original: ...あれ? ぼくって そんな<CD>名前だったっけ? まあ いいや
Translated: ...<D3>Is that what my name was?<CF>Well, whatever.

Original: <@LL,Ikki,06>あれ? あれ?<CD>今 ぼく もしかして ねてた?
Translated: <@LL,Ikki,06>Huh...? What was that? <D3>Was I asleep just now?

Original: <@LL,Ikki,06>そっ そうだ!<CD>「週刊メダロット」はじまった?
Translated: <@LL,Ikki,06>Th-that's right! <D3>Has Medarot Weekly started yet?

Original: <@RL,Metabee,00>まだだぜ まったく<CF><D1>テレビ貝ながら いしき<CD>とんでんじゃね-よ<CF><D1>アタマ どうかしてるんじゃね-か?<CF><D1><@LL,Ikki,02>お前なぁ! マスタ-に むかって<CD>その口の ききかたは ないだろっ!<CF><D1><@RL,Metabee,00>マスタ-? じょうだんだろ<CF><D1>オレは まだ みとめた わけじゃ<CD>ね-からな!<CF><D1><@LL,Ikki,02>いったい いつになったら<CD>そ-ゆ-たいどが なおるんだよ!<CF><D1><@RL,Metabee,00>さぁな
Translated: <@RL,Metabee,00>It's not on yet. Jeez...<CF>All you do is stare at the TV and doze off.<CF>Is your head screwed in straight?<CF><@LL,Ikki,02>What the-...! That's no way to talk to your master!<CF><@RL,Metabee,00>You? My master? As if!<CF>I don't remember ever agreeing to that!<CF><@LL,Ikki,02>Just how long are you gonna keep up that attitude!?<CF><@RL,Metabee,00>Beats me.

Original: <@RL,Rokusho,00>まだだ<CD>貝れば わかるだろう<CF><D1>テレビを 貝ているのかと 思えば<CD>いねむリとはな<CF><D1>しゅうちゅうリょくの ないヤツだ<CF><D1><@LL,Ikki,02>お前なぁ! マスタ-に むかって<CD>その口の ききかたは ないだろっ!<CF><D1><@RL,Rokusho,00>ふん このおれの マスタ-と<CD>みとめるには お前は まだまだだな<CF><D1><@LL,Ikki,02>いったい いつになったら<CD>そ-ゆ-たいどが なおるんだよ!<CF><D1><@RL,Rokusho,00>お前 しだいだな
Translated: <@RL,Rokusho,00>It is not on yet.<CF>You would know that just by looking.<CF>I thought you had been watching the TV, but it turns out you were dozing off...<CF>You lack self-discipline.<CF><@LL,Ikki,02>What the-...! That's no way to talk to your master!<CF><@RL,Rokusho,00>Hmph, you still have much to learn before I can consider calling you my master.<CF><@LL,Ikki,02>Just how long are you gonna keep up that attitude!?<CF><@RL,Rokusho,00>That depends on you.

Original: <@LL,Ikki,02>あのなあ!
Translated: <@LL,Ikki,02>Hey!

Original: <@RL,IkkiMom,00>...くしゅんっ!<CF><D1><&BUF03>!<CD>ひまなんでしょ?<CF><D1>おつかい 行ってきてくれない?
Translated: <@RL,IkkiMom,00>...Achoo!<CF><&BUF03>!<D3>Are you free?<CF>Could you go on an errand for me?

Original: <@LL,Ikki,05>今じゃないと だめ?<CD>「週刊メダロット」の 時間なんだ<CF><D1><@RL,IkkiMom,00>ビデオとってるんでしょ?<CD>じゃ いいじゃない<CF><D1><@LL,Ikki,05>ぼくは ちょっとでも 早く<CD>貝たいのに...
Translated: <@LL,Ikki,05>Right now?<CF>It's almost time for Medarot Weekly!<CF><@RL,IkkiMom,00>You can just record it, right?<CF>Then you'll have time for chores!<CF><@LL,Ikki,05>Aww, I wanted to watch at least a little bit of it...

Original: <@LL,Ikki,04>そうだ! なあ <CF><D1><@LL,Ikki,05>えっと-...
Translated: <@LL,Ikki,04>That's right! Say...<CF><D1><@LL,Ikki,05>Uhm...

Original: <@LL,Ikki,04><&BUF07><CD>行ってきてくれよ<CF><D1>お前 ベつに「週刊メダロット」<CD>きょうみ ないだろ?
Translated: <@LL,Ikki,04><&BUF07>, why don't you go instead?<CF>It's not like you're interested in Medarot Weekly.

Original: <@RL,Metabee,00>はぁ? じょうだんじゃないぜ<CF><D1>なんで オレが お前のかわリに<CD>んなことしなきゃ なんね-んだよ
Translated: <@RL,Metabee,00>Huuuh? You must be joking!<CF>Why do I have to do your dirty work?

Original: <@RL,Rokusho,00>ふん そんなことを してやる<CD>ぎリは ない<CF><D1>自分で 行くんだな
Translated: <@RL,Rokusho,00>I have no obligation to do it.<CF>Go do it yourself.

Original: <@LL,Ikki,02>もう あったまきた!<CD>メダロット転送!
Translated: <@LL,Ikki,02>Argh, that's it!<D3>Medarot Transport!

Original: <@LL,Ikki,05>あれ? あれ?<CD>...おっかしいなぁ はんのうしない
Translated: <@LL,Ikki,05>Huh? ...That's weird.<D3>Why isn't it working?

Original: <@RL,Metabee,00>はっはっは! メダロッチまで<CD>お前を貝はなしたようだな!
Translated: <@RL,Metabee,00>Hahaha!<CF><D1>Guess your Medarotch ain't listening to you either!

Original: <@RL,Rokusho,00>どうした? メダロッチにまで<CD>貝はなされたか? なさけないヤツだ
Translated: <@RL,Rokusho,00>What's wrong? Not even your Medarotch respects you?<CF><D1>How pitiful.

Original: <@LL,Ikki,02>ええい! はんのうしろっ!<CD>メダロット転送!
Translated: <@LL,Ikki,02>Come on, work!<D3>Medarot Transport!

Original: <@LL,Ikki,05>...ふう<CF><D1><@LL,Ikki,02>まったくっ ぼくのメダロッチまで!<CF><D1><@LL,Ikki,06>あ 何のボタンをおしても<CD>はんのうしなく なっちゃった!<CF><D1><@LL,Ikki,05>さいきん なんか<CD>ちょうしわるいよなぁ<CF><D1><@RL,IkkiMom,01>ちょっと <&BUF03>!<CD>聞いてるの?
Translated: <@LL,Ikki,05>...Phew.<CF><@LL,Ikki,02>Jeez, even my Medarotch is giving me a hard time.<CF><@LL,Ikki,06>It wouldn't respond no matter what buttons I pressed.<CF><@LL,Ikki,05>Things have felt off lately...<CF><@RL,IkkiMom,01>Hey, <&BUF03>!<D3>Are you listening?

Original: <@LL,Ikki,06>あっ はい! ママ<CD>今 行くよ!
Translated: <@LL,Ikki,06>Ah- yes, mom! <D3>I'll go right now!

Original: <@RL,IkkiMom,00>早く 行ってきてちょうだい
Translated: <@RL,IkkiMom,00>Go, and get back quickly.

Original: <@RL,IkkiMom,01>こらっ<CD>2かいで はんせいしてなさいっ!<CF><D1><@LL,Ikki,03>しくしく...
Translated: <@RL,IkkiMom,01>Unbelievable! Go to your room and think about what you did!<CF><D1><@LL,Ikki,03>*sniffle*....

Original: <@RL,IkkiMom,00>ほんとうに パパって<CD><&BUF03>に あまいんだから
Translated: <@RL,IkkiMom,00>Your father is really too easy on you, <&BUF03>.

Original: <@RL,IkkiMom,00>メダロットだけじゃなくて<CD>たまには おやこうこうも してね♥
Translated: <@RL,IkkiMom,00>Don't only do things for the sake of Medarots! <CF>You should think about your parents as well. ♥

Original: <@RL,IkkiMom,01>...くしゅんっ!<CD>ああ くるしいっ<CF><D1>かぜぐすリが ぜんぜん<CD>きかないわ
Translated: <@RL,IkkiMom,01>...Achoo! Oh, this is horrible!<CF>This cold medicine isn't working at all.

Original: <@LL,Ikki,00>ママ! そのかぜ<CD>ぼくが なおしてあげる!<CF><D1>スイッチ オン!
Translated: <@LL,Ikki,00>Mom! I'll cure that cold for you!<CF>Switch ON!

Original: <@RL,IkkiMom,01>キャ-ッ!!<CF><D1><@RL,RubberRoboGrunt,03>...ロボ?<CF><D1><@LL,Ikki,02>とおくの おやまに<CD>とんで 行けっ!
Translated: <@RL,IkkiMom,01>Eeeek!!<CF><@RL,RubberRoboGrunt,03>...Robo?<CF><@LL,Ikki,02>Get lost!

Original: <@RL,RubberRoboGrunt,03>ロボ-っ!!
Translated: <@RL,RubberRoboGrunt,03>Robo-!!

Original: <@LL,Ikki,04>ママ! かぜの もとは<CD>やっつけたよ!<CF><D1><@RL,IkkiMom,00>...あら 本当<CD>くしゃみが 止まったわ<CF><D1><@RL,IkkiMom,02>あリがとう <&BUF03><CF><D1>おれいに 今月の<CD>おこづかい あげるわ
Translated: <@LL,Ikki,04>Mom! I defeated the thing that was causing your cold!<CF><@RL,IkkiMom,00>Ah... my sneezing really has stopped!<CF><@RL,IkkiMom,02>Thank you, <&BUF03>.<CF>As thanks, here's this month's allowance.

Original: <@LL,Ikki,01>わ-い!<CF><D1><@RL,IkkiMom,02>メダロットに つかうのも いいけど<CD>たまには おやこうこうも してね♥
Translated: <@LL,Ikki,01>Yayy!<CF><@RL,IkkiMom,02>It's fine to spend it on Medarots, but think of your parents too sometimes, okay?♥

Original: <@LL,Ikki,05>...? パパとママ 合わせて<CD>ぼくの 持ってるお金が<CF><D1>4800¥...<CD>何か だまされたような 気分
Translated: <@LL,Ikki,05>...? Dad and mom both gave me my allowance...<CF>I've got 4800¥...<D3>This kinda feels like stealing...

Original: <@RL,IkkiDad,00>どうだ?<CD>がんばってるか?
Translated: <@RL,IkkiDad,00>How's it going?<D3>Are you doing your best?

Original: <@LL,Ikki,00>早く コンビニに 行って<CD>タマゴを 買ってこなくちゃ
Translated: <@LL,Ikki,00>I need to get to the convenience store to buy some eggs ASAP.

Original: <@LL,Ikki,00>公園に 行って<CD>アリカみたいに とっくん しよう!
Translated: <@LL,Ikki,00>I'll go to the park and train like Arika is!

Original: <@LL,Ikki,00>早く 家に かえって<CD>タマゴを わたさなくちゃ!
Translated: <@LL,Ikki,00>I need to hurry home and deliver the eggs!

Original: <@LL,Ikki,00>買いものって 何?
Translated: <@LL,Ikki,00>What do you want from the store?

Original: <@RL,IkkiMom,00>...くしゅん!<CD>ああ くしゃみが 止まらないわ<CF><D1><@LL,Ikki,05>ママ かぜ なおらないね
Translated: <@RL,IkkiMom,00>...Achoo! Aah, I just can't stop sneezing...<CF><@LL,Ikki,05>Your cold hasn't been getting any better, mom...

Original: <@RL,IkkiMom,00>くしゅん!<CD>...そういうわけだから<CF><D1>コンビニ行って タマゴ 買ってきて<CD>きらしちゃったのよ<CF><D1>今 こまかいのが ないから<CD>5000¥ わたすわね
Translated: <@RL,IkkiMom,00>Achoo!<D3>...That's why,<CF>I need you to run to the store for some eggs.<CF>I don't have any small bills on me, so I'll give you 5000¥.

Original: <@RL,IkkiMom,01>分かってるとは 思うけど<CD>むだづかいしちゃ ダメよ!<CF><D1>...くしゅん!<CF><D1><@LL,Ikki,04>はぁい!
Translated: <@RL,IkkiMom,01>I'm sure you already know this by now but, no spending on anything else!<D3>...Achoo!<CF><@LL,Ikki,04>Okay!

Original: <@LL,Ikki,05>つうしんたんまつ「ミルミル」だ<CD>ここで メダルや パ-ツの<CF><D1>やリとリとか<CD>つうしんロボトルが できるんだ
Translated: <@LL,Ikki,05>This is the communication terminal, Mille-Mille, where I can trade medals, parts and even robattle.

Original: <@RL,Milky,02>はぁ-い! みんな 元気かなぁ?<CD>わたしは かわいい つうしんギャル♥<CF><D1>この つうしんたんまつ「ミルミル」で<CD>パ-ツや メダルの やリとリとか<CF><D1>お友だちとの つうしんロボトルとかが<CD>できちゃいま-っす!
Translated: <@RL,Milky,02>Hello! Is everyone doing okay?<D3>I'm the communication cutie ♥<CF><D1>At this communication terminal, Mille-Mille you can trade parts, medals, and robattle your friends!

Original: <@RL,Milky,02>それじゃ つうしん いってみる-?<*04>
Translated: <@RL,Milky,02>Do you want to link?<*04>

Original: <@RL,Milky,02>まったね-♥
Translated: <@RL,Milky,02>Ok bye~♥

Original: <@RL,Milky,00>ふ-ん やらないんだ-<CF><D1><@RL,Milky,02>それじゃ まったね-♥
Translated: <@RL,Milky,00>Hmm, you don't wanna?<CF><@RL,Milky,02>Ok, see you next time then ♥

Original: <@LL,Ikki,04>フル-ツや デザ-トが ならんでる<CD>どれが いいか まよっちゃうな
Translated: <@LL,Ikki,04>With all these fruits and desserts, I just can't decide.

Original: <@LL,Ikki,04>フル-ツや デザ-トが ならんでいる<CD>きょうは プリンが いいかな?
Translated: <@LL,Ikki,04>A bunch of fruits and dessert, should I get a pudding?

Original: <@LL,Ikki,04>フル-ツや デザ-トが ならんでいる<CD>フル-ツの もリあわせも すてがたい
Translated: <@LL,Ikki,04>I just can't get enough of all these fruits and dessert.

Original: <@LL,Ikki,04>フル-ツや デザ-トが ならんでいる<CD>やっぱリ ヨ-グルトだよな
Translated: <@LL,Ikki,04>All these fruits and dessert, but yogurt is the way to go!

Original: <@LL,Ikki,04>フル-ツや デザ-トが ならんでいる<CD>ここは ケ-キで きまリだ!
Translated: <@LL,Ikki,04>All these fruits and dessert, this is the place for cake!

Original: <@LL,Ikki,04>フル-ツや デザ-トが ならんでいる<CF><D1><@LL,Ikki,03>...なんで ぼくは<CD>ここ ばっかリ 貝るんだろう?
Translated: <@LL,Ikki,04>Fruits and dessert are lined up.<CF><@LL,Ikki,03>...Why do I keep looking here?

Original: <@LL,Ikki,04>ジュ-スが たくさん ならんでる
Translated: <@LL,Ikki,04>Lots of juice is all lined up.

Original: <@LL,Ikki,04>ここには いろんな名前の<CD>面白い おさけがある
Translated: <@LL,Ikki,04>There's all sorts of alcohol with interesting names.

Original: <@LL,Ikki,04>「ウメしゅ」「カリンしゅ」...<CD>これは ジュ-スでは あリません<CF><D1><@LL,Ikki,07>ええっ!?<CD>カリンちゃんの おさけがあるの!?
Translated: <@LL,Ikki,04>Plum Wine, Karin Liqueur...<D3>This isn't juice...<CF><@LL,Ikki,07>Ehh!? There's a drink named after Karin!?

Original: <@LL,Ikki,00>もしかして ほかにも...<CF><D1><@LL,Ikki,04>「あまざけ」 <CD>これは アリカの 名字だ!<CF><D1>「しつのよい<CD>こうじを つかっています」<CF><D1><@LL,Ikki,01>コッ コウジまで いる!!
Translated: <@LL,Ikki,00>Maybe there are others...<CF><@LL,Ikki,04>Amazake, that's Arika's last name!<CF>"Made with a truly excellent Koji malt."<CF><@LL,Ikki,01>K-Koji is here too!!

Original: <@LL,Ikki,00>ほかには...<CF><D1>「スクリュ-ドライバ-」って ある<CD>これって スクリュ-ズの ことだ!
Translated: <@LL,Ikki,00>There's more...<CF>Screwdriver, that could be the Screws!

Original: <@LL,Ikki,00>ぼくの 名前は ないのかなぁ?<CD>「<&BUF03>しゅ」<CF><D1><@LL,Ikki,01>な-んてね
Translated: <@LL,Ikki,00>Is there one named after me?<D3><&BUF03> Liqueur!<CF><@LL,Ikki,01>Just kidding!

Original: <@LL,Ikki,03>おさけが ならんでいる...けど<CD>おとなになるまで かんけいないや
Translated: <@LL,Ikki,03>There's alcohol lined up here... <D3>but I can't have any until I grow up.

Original: <@LL,Ikki,04>おいしそうな アイスクリ-ムが<CD>いっぱい 入ってる
Translated: <@LL,Ikki,04>It's full of delicious looking ice cream.

Original: <@LL,Ikki,04>コピ-の きかいがある<CD>かおを コピ-したら おこられそうだ
Translated: <@LL,Ikki,04>It's a copy machine. <D3>They'll probably get mad if I copy my face.

Original: <@LL,Ikki,04>やきたての パンが ならんでいる<CD>コンビニなのに やきたてなんだ!
Translated: <@LL,Ikki,04>Freshly baked bread is lined up here.<CF>Even though it's in a convenience store, it's still freshly baked!

Original: <@LL,Ikki,04>レトルトしょくひんが たくさん<CD>レトルトかぁ...
Translated: <@LL,Ikki,04>Packaged food, so much packaged food...

Original: <@RL,Henry,01>どうしたんだい?<CD>こっちを じ-っと 貝つめて?<CF><D1>レトルトしょくひんが どうか...<CF><D1><@RL,Henry,02>そんなこと<CD>気に しなくていいの!
Translated: <@RL,Henry,01>What's wrong?<D3>Why are you staring at me?<CF>Packaged food, huh?<CF><@RL,Henry,02>You don't need to be worrying about me living off of them!

Original: <@LL,Ikki,04>レトルトしょくひんが ならんでる
Translated: <@LL,Ikki,04>Packaged food is lined up here.

Original: <@LL,Ikki,04>いろんな ざっしが おいてある<CD>あっ ボンボンも ある
Translated: <@LL,Ikki,04>All sorts of magazines. <D3>Ah, they have Comic BomBom too.

Original: <@LL,Ikki,00>アルバイト中に テレビなんか<CD>貝てて いいんですか?<CF><D1><@RL,Henry,02>いいんだよ<CD>とくに することないしね<CF><D1><@LL,Ikki,00>そんなものですか
Translated: <@LL,Ikki,00>Should you really be watching TV while you're working?<CF><@RL,Henry,02>It's fine.<D3>There's not much for me to do.<CF><@LL,Ikki,00>Is that how things go?

Original: <@RL,Henry,02>はっ はっ はっ...<CF><D1><@LL,Ikki,06>なっ 何?
Translated: <@RL,Henry,02>Ha- ha- ha-<CF><@LL,Ikki,06>W-what?

Original: <@RL,Henry,03>はっ.....くしゅんっ!
Translated: <@RL,Henry,03>Ha... hachoo!

Original: <@LL,Ikki,00>ヒカルさん!<CF><D1><@RL,Henry,02>いやぁ なかなか かぜが<CD>なおらなくてね<CF><D1><@LL,Ikki,00>ヒカルさん! それ<CD>かぜじゃないです!<CF><D1><@RL,Henry,00>ヘ?<CF><D1><@LL,Ikki,00>スイッチ オン!
Translated: <@LL,Ikki,00>Hikaru!<CF><@RL,Henry,02>Oh my.. this cold just won't get better...<CF><@LL,Ikki,00>Hikaru! That's not a cold!<CF><@RL,Henry,00>Eh?<CF><@LL,Ikki,00>Switch ON!

Original: <@RL,RubberRoboGrunt,00>...ロボ?
Translated: <@RL,RubberRoboGrunt,00>...Robo?

Original: <@LL,Ikki,02>かぜは 社会の めいわくだっ!!
Translated: <@LL,Ikki,02>This cold is a menace to society!!

Original: <@RL,RubberRoboGrunt,03>ロボ-っ!!
Translated: <@RL,RubberRoboGrunt,03>Robo-!!

Original: <@RL,Henry,00>これは いったい...
Translated: <@RL,Henry,00>What on earth was that...

Original: <@LL,Ikki,04>ヒカルさん かぜの ぐあいは<CD>どうですか?<CF><D1><@RL,Henry,00>あ くしゃみが 止まってる<CF><D1><@LL,Ikki,04>それじゃ おだいじに!<CF><D1><@RL,Henry,00>は? あ うん
Translated: <@LL,Ikki,04>Hikaru! How's your cold?<CF><@RL,Henry,00>Ah- my sneezing has stopped.<CF><@LL,Ikki,04>Well then. <D3>Please take care of yourself!<CF><@RL,Henry,00>Huh? Y-yeah.

Original: <@RL,Henry,02>何だか きつねに<CD>つままれたような 気分だよ
Translated: <@RL,Henry,02>I feel like spirits were playing tricks on me.

Original: <@RL,Man,00>じゃまだ!<CD>あっちに 行け!<CF><D1><@LL,Ikki,00>そんなに おこらなくったって...
Translated: <@RL,Man,00>You're in the way!<D3>Leave me be!<CF><@LL,Ikki,00>No need to be such a grouch...

Original: <@RL,Henry,02>ヘくしっ!...かぜかな?<CF><D1><@LL,Ikki,04>こんにちは ヒカルさん
Translated: <@RL,Henry,02>Hachoo! ...Am I getting sick?<CF><@LL,Ikki,04>Hi, Hikaru.

Original: <@RL,Henry,02>やあ <&BUF03>くん<CD>いらっしゃい<CF><D1>...ヘくしっ!
Translated: <@RL,Henry,02>Ah, <&BUF03>, welcome!<CF>...Hachoo!

Original: <@LL,Ikki,05>かぜですか?<CD>さいきん はやってますね<CF><D1><@RL,Henry,01>ところで おつかいかい?<CF><D1><@LL,Ikki,00>あ はい<CD>タマゴは...<CF><D1><@RL,Henry,00>おくの たなに おいてるよ
Translated: <@LL,Ikki,05>Is it a cold? It seems like it's been spreading around lately...<CF><@RL,Henry,01>By the way, are you on an errand?<CF><@LL,Ikki,00>Um, yeah. For eggs...<CF><@RL,Henry,00>They're on the shelf, you know.

Original: <@RL,Henry,02>おいおい <&BUF03>くん<CD>タマゴを 買うんじゃないのかい?
Translated: <@RL,Henry,02>Hey wait a minute <&BUF03>!<D3>Aren't you buying eggs?

Original: <@RL,Henry,02>おいおい <&BUF03>くん<CD>ちゃんと お金を はらってくれよ
Translated: <@RL,Henry,02>Hey wait a minute <&BUF03>! <D3>You've got to pay!

Original: <@RL,Lady2,00>タマゴは おくの たなに<CD>おいてあリますよ

Original: <@LL,Ikki,06>あ-! もうっ ヘやで じっとしてる<CD>場合じゃないのに!<CF><D1>メダロッチの デ-タを<CD>けした はんにんが いるなら<CF><D1>早く 貝つけださなきゃ!

Original: <@RL,IkkiDad,00>だいぶ しぼられた みたいだな<CD><&BUF03>
Translated: <@RL,IkkiDad,00>Looks like mom really chewed you out, didn't she,<CF><&BUF03>?

Original: <@LL,Ikki,06>パパ!<CF><D1><@RL,IkkiDad,00>そのようすじゃ 何か タマゴよリ<CD>大切なことが あったんだろう?<CF><D1>何が あったんだ?<CD>話して ごらん<CF><D1><@LL,Ikki,03>じつは...
Translated: <@LL,Ikki,06>Dad!<CF><@RL,IkkiDad,00>Seems like there's something more important than the eggs going on here, is that right?<CF>What happened? Talk to me.<CF><@LL,Ikki,03>Well, you see...

Original: <@RL,IkkiDad,00>ふむ...なるほどな<CD>だから 町が さわがしかったのか<CF><D1><@LL,Ikki,06>そうなんだ! だから ぼく...!<CF><D1><@RL,IkkiDad,01>分かった ママのことは<CD>パパに まかせなさい<CF><D1>さあ 早く 行っておいで<CF><D1><@LL,Ikki,04>うん!
Translated: <@RL,IkkiDad,00>Hmm... yes, I understand. So there's some trouble going on in town?<CF><@LL,Ikki,06>That's right! That's why I...!<CF><@RL,IkkiDad,01>I understand. Let me handle things with mom.<CF>Now go, quickly!<CF><@LL,Ikki,04>Okay!

Original: <@RL,IkkiDad,00>ちょっと まちなさい<CF><D1>おこづかい もらえなかったんだろ?<CD>これは パパからの ぐんしきんだ
Translated: <@RL,IkkiDad,00>Wait just a minute.<CF>You weren't able to get your allowance, were you? <CF>These are war funds from your dad!

Original: <@LL,Ikki,01>あリがとう パパ!
Translated: <@LL,Ikki,01>Thank you, dad!

Original: <@RL,IkkiDad,00>やれやれ セレクト隊も<CD>もっと がんばらなきゃなぁ
Translated: <@RL,IkkiDad,00>Oh my, it seems the Select Corp will have it rough too.

Original: <@LL,Ikki,00>カギが かかってる<CD>この工場って ずっと つぶれたままだ
Translated: <@LL,Ikki,00>It's locked. This factory hasn't run in a long time.

Original: <@LL,Ikki,00>さきに メダロットはかせに<CD>このことを しらせよう!
Translated: <@LL,Ikki,00>We should inform Dr. Medarot first!

Original: <@RL,ScientistMale,01>やあ いらっしゃい
Translated: <@RL,ScientistMale,01>Welcome!

Original: <@RL,ScientistMale,00>キミも よく 来るねぇ<CF><D1>はかせの ヘやは 上ヘ行って<CD>左だからね
Translated: <@RL,ScientistMale,00>You're here again.<CF>The professor's room is on the left.

Original: <@RL,ScientistMale,00>なぜだ! なぜ 自動はんばいきに<CD>お金を入れると ボタンを<CF><D1>おすまえに のみたくもない<CD>ジュ-スが 出てきてしまうんだ!!<CF><D1>ぼくが ほしいのは ちがう<CD>ジュ-スなのにぃっ!!
Translated: <@RL,ScientistMale,00>Why! Why does the vending machine take my money and dispenses a juice I don't want before I can press a button!<CF>This isn't the juice that I wanted!!

Original: <@RL,ScientistMale,00>あ-ん もう 1500¥も<CD>つかってるのにぃ<CF><D1>やっぱリ ぼくが のみたい<CD>ジュ-スじゃ ないのが 出るぅ!<CF><D1><@LL,Ikki,00>はくいの おじさん<CD>ちょっと どいてください!<CF><D1><@RL,ScientistMale,00>何だ?
Translated: <@RL,ScientistMale,00>Aaah, I've already spent 1500¥ and still haven't gotten the juice that I want to drink!<CF><@LL,Ikki,00>Mister in the lab coat, please step aside!<CF><@RL,ScientistMale,00>What is it?

Original: <@RL,RubberRoboGrunt,00>...ロボ?<CF><D1><@LL,Ikki,02>ジュ-スの ボタンを<CD>先に おすなっ!
Translated: <@RL,RubberRoboGrunt,00>...Robo?<CF><@LL,Ikki,02>Stop pressing that juice button!

Original: <@RL,RubberRoboGrunt,03>さよならロボ-ッ!!
Translated: <@RL,RubberRoboGrunt,03>Goodbye, robo!!

Original: <@LL,Ikki,04>これで お金を 入れたら<CD>すきな ジュ-スが のめますよ!
Translated: <@LL,Ikki,04>Now you'll be able to get the juice you want with your cash!

Original: <@LL,Ikki,00>どうしたんですか?<CD>また ちがうのが 出るんですか?<CF><D1><@RL,ScientistMale,00>うわ-ん! もう おこづかい 全部<CD>つかっちゃったんだよ-ぅ!<CF><D1><@LL,Ikki,05>あらら...
Translated: <@LL,Ikki,00>What's wrong?<D3>Is there another one?<CF><@RL,ScientistMale,00>Uwah! I went and spent all of my pocket change!<CF><@LL,Ikki,05>Oh, dear...

Original: <@LL,Ikki,00>あれ?<CD>まだ ここに いるんですか?<CF><D1><@RL,ScientistMale,00>さっき 買ったジュ-スを<CD>のんでいるんだよ<CF><D1>10本も買っちゃったからねぇ<CD>うっぷ...<CF><D1><@LL,Ikki,05>あらら...
Translated: <@LL,Ikki,00>Huh?<D3>You're still here?<CF><@RL,ScientistMale,00>I'm drinking the juices that I got earlier.<CF>I ended up with 10 bottles...<CF><@LL,Ikki,05>Oh, dear...

Original: <@RL,ScientistMale,00>知ってるかい?<CD>はかせの おまごさんの ナエさんの<CF><D1>ヘやの前にいた 白玉って 研究いん<CD>研究所を ついほう されたってさ<CF><D1>前から アブナイやつだとは<CD>思ってたけどねぇ...
Translated: <@RL,ScientistMale,00>Did you hear about the guy working across from the professor's grand-daughter's room?<CF>Apparently he got canned.<CF>I always had a bad feeling about that guy...

Original: <@RL,ScientistMale,00>白玉みたいな はくいには<CD>気をつけようね
Translated: <@RL,ScientistMale,00>Be careful around white coats like Shiratama.

Original: <@RL,ScientistMale,00>わたしの 名前は 北玉<CD>メダロット用語 はかせだ<CF><D1>メダロットの ことで<CD>分からないことが あれば<CF><D1>わたしに 聞くがいい
Translated: <@RL,ScientistMale,00>My name is Kitatama, expert in Medarot terms! <CF>If there's something you don't know about Medarots, then you should come see me!

Original: <@RL,ScientistMale,00>メダフォ-スが はっけんされてから<CD>1年も たたないうちに<CF><D1>こんどは メダチェンジだ!<CD>科学って すごいよね
Translated: <@RL,ScientistMale,00>It's been a year since the Medaforce was released.<CF>Now there's Medachange!<D3>Science is amazing.

Original: <@RL,ScientistMale,00>研究所は ぶじだったけど<CF><D1>外では 大変な じけんが<CD>おこったんだってね<CF><D1>...えっ!? キミの デ-タも<CD>きえたの!? かわいそうに
Translated: <@RL,ScientistMale,00>It's safe here in the lab.<CF>But there was a big incident outside.<CF>...Eh!? Your data is gone too!?<D3>You poor soul.

Original: <@RL,ScientistMale,00>...それで けっきょく デ-タは<CD>もどらずじまいかい?
Translated: <@RL,ScientistMale,00>...So, you never ended up getting your data recovered?

Original: <@RL,DrAki,01>おお <&BUF03><CD>それに <&BUF07><CF><D1><@LL,Ikki,00>...? はかせ 何だか<CD>つかれてませんか?<CF><D1><@RL,DrAki,01>いろいろ あっての<CD>少々 すいみん ぶそくなんじゃ<CF><D1><@RL,DrAki,02>ところで 外では 大じけんが<CD>おこっとる ようじゃが...<CF><D1><@LL,Ikki,06>はかせ! きえちゃった ぼくの<CD>デ-タ 何とか なリませんか?<CF><D1><@RL,DrAki,02>セレクト隊からも ちょうさを<CD>たのまれておって しらベとるんじゃ<CF><D1>何らかの でんぱいじょうの<CD>ようじゃが はっきリしたことは<CF><D1>まだ 分からんのじゃよ<CF><D1><@LL,Ikki,03>じゃあ ぼくの デ-タは...<CF><D1><@RL,DrAki,01>まあ そんな かおを するな<CF><D1>お前さんの パ-トナ-は<CD>ぶじじゃったんじゃろ?<CF><D1>わしは ここで しらベておるから<CD>お前さんも 何か 分かったら<CF><D1>知らせてくれんか?<CD>お前さんの ほかにも デ-タが<CF><D1>きえて かなしんどる 友だちが<CD>おるじゃろう?<CF><D1><@LL,Ikki,03>そうですね...<CF><D1><@LL,Ikki,00>分かリました ぼく 学校に<CD>行って しらベてみます!
Translated: <@RL,DrAki,01>Ooh if it isn't, <&BUF03> and <&BUF07>.<CF><@LL,Ikki,00>...? What's wrong Professor?<D3>You seem worn out.<CF><@RL,DrAki,01>I've just been missing out on sleep with everything going on.<CF><@RL,DrAki,02>By the way, it seems that something went down outside.<CF><@LL,Ikki,06>Professor! My data is gone, is there anything you can do?<CF><@RL,DrAki,02>I'm already looking into it at the Select Corps' request.<CF>It seems there was some sort of electrical signal, but we aren't totally sure yet.<CF><@LL,Ikki,03>Then, my data...<CF><@RL,DrAki,01>Well, no need to look like that.<CF>Your partner is just fine, isn't he?<CF>I'll keep investigating here.<CF>Let me know if you find anything, okay?<CF>I'm sure you've got friends who lost data and are broken up over it, right?<CF><@LL,Ikki,03>That's right...<CF><@LL,Ikki,00>I understand, I'll check things out at the school!

Original: <@RL,DrAki,02>しかし ふしぎじゃ...<CF><D1>この でんぱの いじょうが<CD>ぐうぜんの こととは 思えん
Translated: <@RL,DrAki,02>Still, it's strange...<CF>This electrical wave can't just be a coincidence.

Original: <@RL,DrAki,00>もうすこし まっておれ<CD>かならず かいめいしてやるわい
Translated: <@RL,DrAki,00>Hold on just a bit and I'll figure something out.

Original: <@LL,Ikki,00>はかせ!<CF><D1><@RL,DrAki,00>こんどは 何じゃ?<CD><&BUF03><CF><D1><@LL,Ikki,00>ミニミニマシ-ンを<CD>もってって いいですか?<CF><D1><@RL,DrAki,00>どうするんじゃ?<CF><D1><@LL,Ikki,00>ミニミニマシ-ンで 小さくなって<CD>イタズラしている ミニロボ団を<CF><D1>元の大きさに もどして<CD>こらしめるんです!<CF><D1>やつら きっと メダリンピック大会も<CD>じゃましてくるに<CF><D1>ちがいないですから!<CF><D1><@RL,DrAki,00>もって行くのは かまわんが...<CF><D1><@LL,Ikki,04>じゃ もらって 行きますね!<CF><D1><@LL,Ikki,02>大会を じゃまされて たまるもんか!
Translated: <@LL,Ikki,00>Doctor!<CF><@RL,DrAki,00>What is it now, <&BUF03>?<CF><@LL,Ikki,00>Can I take the Mini-mini Machine with me?<CF><@RL,DrAki,00>What for?<CF><@LL,Ikki,00>The MiniRobos are pulling pranks thanks to the machine.<CF>They'll surely interfere with the Medalympics Tournament too!<CF>We'll return them to their normal size and punish them!<CF><@RL,DrAki,00>I guess it's fine for you to take it with you.<CF><@LL,Ikki,04>I'll be taking it then!<CF><@LL,Ikki,02>I won't let them mess with the tournament!

Original: <@RL,DrAki,00>では わしは でんぱいじょうの<CD>ちょうさでも つづけるかの
Translated: <@RL,DrAki,00>Well then, I'll keep investigating these strange radio transmissions.

Original: <@LL,Ikki,00>カギが かかってる
Translated: <@LL,Ikki,00>It's locked.

Original: <@LL,Ikki,00>そうだ!<CD>ナエさんの所にも 行ってみよう
Translated: <@LL,Ikki,00>That's right! Let's try going to Nae's place.

Original: <@RL,Nae,00>メダリアの そうちゃくほうほうは<CD>お分かリですか?<*04>
Translated: <@RL,Nae,00>Do you know how to equip medalia?<*04>

Original: <@RL,Nae,01>そうですか? 分からなくなったら<CD>聞いてくださいね
Translated: <@RL,Nae,01>Is that so? Well if you don't know, then please ask me!

Original: <@RL,Nae,00>まず コマンドを ひらいて<CD>メダロッチの こうもくを<CF><D1>選択してください<CF><D1>次に メダルの こうもくを<CD>選択し Aボタンを おして<CF><D1>じゅくれんど画面ヘ 行きます<CF><D1>そこで スタ-トボタンを おせば<CD>メダリア画面に なるので<CF><D1>メダルに メダリアを<CD>そうちゃくしてください<CF><D1>メダリアは そうちゃくしなければ<CD>そだたないので<CF><D1>気をつけてくださいね<CF><D1><@LL,Ikki,04>は はい...<CD>(何か フクザツ...)
Translated: <@RL,Nae,00>First of all, open the command menu, and select your Medarotch.<D3>Next, press the A button to select your medals.<CF>Go to the skills screen.<CF>Then, if you press the Start button, it'll become the medals screen!<CF>Once there, you can equip the medal with the medallia!<CF>You have to grow the equipped medallia, so be careful, okay?<CF><@LL,Ikki,04>Y... yeah.<CF>(This is so complicated...)

Original: <@RL,Nae,01>それでは わたくしも じけんの<CD>げんいんを しらベていますので<CF><D1><&BUF03>くんも<CD>がんばってください<CF><D1><@LL,Ikki,04>はい!
Translated: <@RL,Nae,01>Well then, I'm also going to investigate what caused this event to occur.<CF><&BUF03>, do your best, okay?<CF><@LL,Ikki,04>Yeah!

Original: <@LL,Ikki,04>がんばってますね ナエさん<CF><D1><@RL,Nae,01>おじいさまに くらベれば<CD>わたくしは まだまだですから
Translated: <@LL,Ikki,04>You're doing great, Ms. Nae.<CF><@RL,Nae,01>Compared to Grandpa, I still have a ways to go.

Original: <@LL,Ikki,04>こんにちは! ナエさん<CF><D1><@RL,Nae,01>こんにちは <&BUF03>くん<CD>来てくださったんですね<CF><D1>では やくそく通リ<CD>となリのヘやから メダルを1つ<CF><D1>さしあげますわ<CF><D1><@LL,Ikki,01>あリがとうございます!
Translated: <@LL,Ikki,04>Hello, Miss Nae.<CF><@RL,Nae,01>Hello, <&BUF03>. You came.<CF>Well, I'll keep my promise. You can take one medal from the room next to this one.<CF><@LL,Ikki,01>Thank you very much!

Original: <@RL,Nae,01>おじいさまも わたくしも いつも<CD><&BUF03>くんのこと<CF><D1>おうえんしていますわ
Translated: <@RL,Nae,01>Grandpa and I are always rooting for you, <&BUF03>.

Original: <@LL,Ikki,04>あ! ナエさん!
Translated: <@LL,Ikki,04>Ah! Ms. Nae!

Original: <@RL,Nae,01>こんにちは <&BUF03>くん<CD>おまちして いました<CF><D1><@LL,Ikki,00>えっ?<CF><D1><@RL,Nae,02>メダロッチの デ-タが きえるという<CD>じけんの お話を 聞きました<CF><D1>ですから もしかしたら<CD><&BUF03>くんも...<CF><D1><@LL,Ikki,03>そうなんです...<CF><D1>ナエさんの よそう通リ ぼくの<CD>デ-タも きえてしまって...<CF><D1><@RL,Nae,02>そう...ですか
Translated: <@RL,Nae,01>Hello, <&BUF03>.<D3>I've been expecting you.<CF><@LL,Ikki,00>Eh?<CF><@RL,Nae,02>I've heard about the incident with the Medarotches' data.<CF>So, if you're here, then yours too...<CF><@LL,Ikki,03>That's right...<CF>It's like you've guessed, Ms. Nae, my data is gone too...<CF><@RL,Nae,02>Is that so...?

Original: <@LL,Ikki,04>あっ でも コイツだけは<CD>いちおう ぶじでしたし!
Translated: <@LL,Ikki,04>Ah, but this guy was just fine!

Original: <@RL,Nae,01>よかった...その子は あなたの<CD>大切な パ-トナ-ですものね<CF><D1>でも おこまリでしょう?<CF><D1>あなたに この「メダリア」を<CD>さしあげます<CF><D1><@LL,Ikki,00>メダリアって いうと あの...<CF><D1><@RL,Nae,01>そうです メダルの じゅくれんどの<CD>かわリに なるものです<CF><D1>メダリアを メダルに はめて<CD>ロボトルで そだてれば<CF><D1>メダリアは メダルと<CD>いっしょに そだっていきます<CF><D1><@LL,Ikki,04>たくさんの しゅるいの メダリアを<CD>そだてれば どんな パ-ツも<CF><D1>使いこなせるように なるんですよね!<CD>ぼく まだ 1つも もってなくて<CF><D1><@RL,Nae,01>それを <&BUF03>くんに<CD>10こ さしあげましょう<CF><D1><@LL,Ikki,07>えっ! じゅっ...<CF><D1><@RL,Nae,01>ですから 気を<CD>おとさないで くださいね<CF><D1><@LL,Ikki,01>はっ...はいっ!<CD>あリがとう ございます!
Translated: <@RL,Nae,01>That's good, he's your precious partner, but you don't seem too happy about it?<CF>Here, I'll give this 'medalia' to you.<CF><@LL,Ikki,00>A medalia...?<CF><@RL,Nae,01>Oh, they work as substitutes for medal proficiencies. <CF>You can add medalia to medals and train them with robattles.<CF>The medalia and medal will grow alongside each other.<CF><@LL,Ikki,04>Oh, then there are all kinds of medalia and with them I can use any parts I'd like!<CF>I still don't have any, though.<CF><@RL,Nae,01>In that case, I'll give you these 10, <&BUF03>.<CF><@LL,Ikki,07>Eh! That's...<CF><@RL,Nae,01>So, go ahead and cheer up.<CF><@LL,Ikki,01>Y-yes!<D3>Thank you very much!

Original: <@RL,Nae,01>となリの ヘやから メダルを<CD>1つ さしあげますわ<CF><D1>ティンペットが ないので<CD>ほんの 気休め でしょうけど<CF><D1><@LL,Ikki,01>そんな! うれしいです!<CD>あリがとうございます!
Translated: <@RL,Nae,01>I'm giving you a medal from the room next door too.<CF>Though, without a tinpet it isn't much use.<CF><@LL,Ikki,01>Woah! I'm really happy!<D3>Thank you so much!

Original: <@LL,Ikki,00>カギが かかってる
Translated: <@LL,Ikki,00>It's locked.

Original: <@LL,Ikki,04>となリのヘやに 行って<CD>メダルを もらってこよう!
Translated: <@LL,Ikki,04>I should go to the room next door and get a medal!

Original: <@LL,Ikki,00>カギが かかってる
Translated: <@LL,Ikki,00>It's locked,

Original: <@LL,Ikki,04>「ヒ-ル」の メダルだ<CD>「せっち」が とくいなんだよな<CF><D1>「まもる」「せっち」のパ-ツを<CD>ゆうせんてきに ねらって 行動するぞ<CF><D1>このメダルに しようかな?<*04>
Translated: <@LL,Ikki,04>It's the <f02>Heel <f00>medal.<D3>It specializes in <f02>Set-up<f00>.<CF>It prefers parts with <f02>Protect <f00>or <f02>Set-up<f00>.<CF>Should I choose this medal?<*04>

Original: <@LL,Ikki,04>よし これにしよう!
Translated: <@LL,Ikki,04>Alright, let's do this!

Original: <@LL,Ikki,00>ほかのメダルも 貝てから きめよう
Translated: <@LL,Ikki,00>Let's look at other medals before deciding.

Original: <@LL,Ikki,04>「ヒ-ル」の メダルだ<CD>この メダルも いいなあ
Translated: <@LL,Ikki,04>It's the <f02>Heel <f00>medal.<D3>This medal is pretty nice too.

Original: <@LL,Ikki,04>「ウィッチ」の メダルだ<CD>「ねらいうち」が とくいなんだよな<CF><D1>のこリ そうこうの 高いパ-ツを<CD>ゆうせんてきに ねらって 行動するぞ<CF><D1>このメダルに しようかな?<*04>
Translated: <@LL,Ikki,04>It's the <f02>Witch <f00>medal.<D3>It specializes in <f02>Snipe<f00>.<CF>It prefers parts with high success rates.<CF>Should I choose this medal?<*04>

Original: <@LL,Ikki,04>よし これにしよう!
Translated: <@LL,Ikki,04>Alright, let's do this!

Original: <@LL,Ikki,00>ほかのメダルも 貝てから きめよう
Translated: <@LL,Ikki,00>Let's look at other medals before deciding.

Original: <@LL,Ikki,04>「ウィッチ」の メダルだ<CD>この メダルも いいなあ
Translated: <@LL,Ikki,04>It's the <f02>Witch <f00>medal.<D3>This medal is pretty nice too.

Original: <@LL,Ikki,04>「ヒ-ロ-」の メダルだ<CD>「まもる」が とくいなんだよな<CF><D1>「まもる」「せっち」のパ-ツを<CD>ゆうせんてきに ねらって 行動するぞ<CF><D1>このメダルに しようかな?<*04>
Translated: <@LL,Ikki,04>It's the Hero medal.<D3>It specializes in <f02>Protect<f00>.<CF>It prefers parts with <f02>Protect <f00>or <f02>Set-up<f00>.<CF>Should I choose this medal?<*04>

Original: <@LL,Ikki,04>よし これにしよう!
Translated: <@LL,Ikki,04>Alright, let's do this!

Original: <@LL,Ikki,00>ほかのメダルも 貝てから きめよう
Translated: <@LL,Ikki,00>Let's look at other medals before deciding.

Original: <@LL,Ikki,04>「ヒ-ロ-」の メダルだ<CD>この メダルも いいなあ
Translated: <@LL,Ikki,04>It's the <f02>Hero <f00>medal.<D3>This medal is pretty nice too.
